definition[0]: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality
example[0]: They were told to take whatever action they deemed necessary.
example[1]: They deemed that he was no longer capable of managing the business.
example[2]: They were deemed to be illegal immigrants.
example[3]: UK plans were deemed to infringe EU law.
explanation[0]: Deem is not used in the progressive You say
example[4]: He deems it his duty to report the incident
bad_example[0]: He is deeming it his duty to report the incident
